1.content:
This story follows Cameron, a 35 year old man looking for his next sexual thrill.

Thankfully he downloaded this new version of Tinder called Shrinkr which if you swipe towards that person on your phone, they will appear in front of you six inches tall.

Who does Cameron swipe first?
1.title: Shrinkr

choices: "We're gonna have sex at my place"
14.content:
Cameron found a beautiful 18 year old brunette with olive oil skin and long dark brown hair named Ally. She had a fun smile, and beautiful blue eyes.

"She seems like a fun date."

Cameron swiped the picture and suddenly his phone glowed and shook and suddenly standing on his phone was Ally herself. Except she was six inches tall. She was wearing a black tank top with a jean skirt and sunglasses.

She looked up in fear at the giant man smiling at her.

"Who are you??!! Where am I??! Why am I small!? The italian brunette screamed and tried to run but on Cameron's phone there was no escape. He quickly snatched the beautiful girl and brought her up to his face smiling.

She really was pretty. Her gorgeous skin, beautiful long hair, and wonderful curves made her a sight to see even at her diminutive size.

"So you're Ally huh? My name is Cameron. I found you on my Shrinkr app. All I had to do was swipe your picture and now poof, here you are my pretty little doll."

What does Cameron say to Ally
14.title: Tiny Ally

choices: He shoves Ally down his pants
142.content:
"We're gonna have sex at my place. Just you and me Ally."

Ally's face turned white at the thought of having sex with this giant stranger.

"No! Put me down! I don't wanna be tiny and I don't wanna have sex!"

"You're gonna love it baby," Cameron said as he lightly booped her tiny nose.

Stuffing her deep into his pocket, Cameron made his way home, and sat down on the couch pulling the five inch tall brunette from his pocket to analyze her cute form.

Her sunglasses had fallen off of her face and the tan brown haired beauty was staring up at Cameron with a sad deer in head lights expression.

"Now Ally, its time that you and I began our sexual exploits!"

What does Cameron do?
142.title: Sex with Ally
